Name: return
Description: Nominal annual return = [(Future value of all cash-inflows + loan amount)/ loan amount]^(1/(actual loan duration in days/365)) - 1

Name: NPRP
Description: Nominal profit in % = cash inflows / loan amount - 1

Name: NPRA
Description: Nominal nete cash = sum of all cash inflows - loan amount

Name: FVCI
Description: Value of cash inflows - loan amount

Name: Age
Description: The age of the loan applicant

Name: Gender
Description: 1 - Woman, 0 - Male or couple of undefined

Name: Interest
Description: Maximum iterest accepted in the loan application

Name: MonthlyPayment
Description: Estimated amount the borrower has to pay every month

Name: DebtToIncome
Description: Ratio of borrower's monthly gross income that goes toward paying loans

Name: time
Description: Time index in days = Current date of the loan application - Earliest date of a loan application in the dataset

Name: ver.2
Description: Method used to verify loan application data - income unverified, cross-referenced by phone

Name: ver.3
Description: Method used to verify loan application data - income verified

Name: ver.4
Description: Method used to verify loan application data - income and expenses verified

Name: log.amount
Description: Natural log of the loan amount

Name: depen.0
Description: Loan applicant's number of children or other dependants - 0

Name: depen.1
Description: Loan applicant's number of children or other dependants - 1

Name: depen.2
Description: Loan applicant's number of children or other dependants - 2

Name: depen.3
Description: Loan applicant's number of children or other dependants - 3

Name: depen.4
Description: Loan applicant's number of children or other dependants - 4

Name: employ.2
Description: Loan applicant's employment status - partially employed

Name: employ.3
Description: Loan applicant's employment status - fully employed

Name: em.dur.5p
Description: Loan applicant's employment duration - more than 5 years

Name: em.dur.trial
Description: Loan applicant's employment duration - trial period

Description: Loan applicant's employment duration - less than 1 years

Description: Loan applicant's employment duration - less than 2 years

Description: Loan applicant's employment duration - less than 3 years

Description: Loan applicant's experience - less than 10 years

Description: Loan applicant's experience - less than 15 years

Name: exper.25y
Description: Loan applicant's experience - less than 25 years

Name: exper.25p
Description: Loan applicant's experience - more than 25 years

Description: Loan applicant's home ownership type - tenant

Description: Loan applicant's home ownership type - joint ownership

Description: Loan applicant's home ownership type - owner with encumbrance

Description: 1 - has income from a principal employer

Description: The amount of income from the principla employer [log(x+1)]

Name: inc.pension.l
Description: The amount of income from a pension [log(x+1)]

Description: The amount of income from child support [log(x+1)]

Name: inc.other.l
Description: The amount of income from other sources [log(x+1)]
